segment.source: MD Conversion - iOS custom policy settings in Microsoft Intune
segment.target: MD Conversion - iOS custom policy settings in Microsoft Intune

segment.source: MD Conversion - iOS custom policy settings in Microsoft Intune
segment.target: MD Conversion - iOS custom policy settings in Microsoft Intune

segment.source: Use the iOS custom configuration policy to deploy settings that you created using the Apple Configurator tool to iOS devices.
segment.target: Use the iOS custom configuration policy to deploy settings that you created using the Apple Configurator tool to iOS devices.

segment.source: This tool lets you create many settings that control the operation of these devices and export them to a configuration profile.
segment.target: This tool lets you create many settings that control the operation of these devices and export them to a configuration profile.

segment.source: You can then import this configuration profile into a iOS custom policy and deploy the settings to users and devices in your organization.
segment.target: You can then import this configuration profile into a iOS custom policy and deploy the settings to users and devices in your organization.

segment.source: This capability is intended to allow you to deploy iOS settings that are not configurable with policies.
segment.target: This capability is intended to allow you to deploy iOS settings that are not configurable with policies.

segment.source: For information about the settings you can configure with these policies, see iOS configuration policy settings in Microsoft Intune.
segment.target: For information about the settings you can configure with these policies, see iOS configuration policy settings in Microsoft Intune.

segment.source: Prerequisites
segment.target: Prerequisites

segment.source: Before you start, you must have installed the Apple Configurator and created a configuration file containing the settings you want to deploy to users or devices.
segment.target: Before you start, you must have installed the Apple Configurator and created a configuration file containing the settings you want to deploy to users or devices.

segment.source: You can download and learn about the Apple Configurator from the Mac App Store
segment.target: You can download and learn about the Apple Configurator from the Mac App Store

segment.source: does not report the compliance of individual settings in an iOS custom policy.
segment.target: does not report the compliance of individual settings in an iOS custom policy.

segment.source: However, the overall compliance of the policy is reported.
segment.target: However, the overall compliance of the policy is reported.

segment.source: How to create an iOS custom policy
segment.target: How to create an iOS custom policy

segment.source: In the Microsoft Intune administration console, click Policy > Overview > Add Policy.
segment.target: In the Microsoft Intune administration console, click Policy > Overview > Add Policy.

segment.source: Configure a policy of the type iOS > Custom Configuration.
segment.target: Configure a policy of the type iOS > Custom Configuration.

segment.source: For help creating and deploying policies, see Use policies to manage computers and mobile devices with Microsoft Intune.
segment.target: For help creating and deploying policies, see Use policies to manage computers and mobile devices with Microsoft Intune.

segment.source: You can only create and deploy a custom iOS custom policy.
segment.target: You can only create and deploy a custom iOS custom policy.

segment.source: Recommended settings are not available.
segment.target: Recommended settings are not available.

segment.source: Use the following table to help you configure the policy settings:
segment.target: Use the following table to help you configure the policy settings:

segment.source: Setting name
segment.target: Setting name

segment.source: More information
segment.target: More information

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Enter a unique name for the iOS custom policy to help you identify it in the console.
segment.target: Enter a unique name for the iOS custom policy to help you identify it in the console.

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Provide a description that gives an overview of the iOS custom policy and other relevant information that helps you to locate it.
segment.target: Provide a description that gives an overview of the iOS custom policy and other relevant information that helps you to locate it.

segment.source: Custom configuration profile name (displayed to users)
segment.target: Custom configuration profile name (displayed to users)

segment.source: Provide a name for the policy as it will be displayed on the device, and in policy reports.
segment.target: Provide a name for the policy as it will be displayed on the device, and in policy reports.

segment.source: Configuration profile file
segment.target: Configuration profile file

segment.source: Click Import, then browse to the configuration profile that you created using the Apple Configurator.
segment.target: Click Import, then browse to the configuration profile that you created using the Apple Configurator.

segment.source: Ensure that the settings you export from the Apple Configurator tool are compatible with the version of iOS on the devices to which you deploy the iOS custom policy.
segment.target: Ensure that the settings you export from the Apple Configurator tool are compatible with the version of iOS on the devices to which you deploy the iOS custom policy.

segment.source: For information about how incompatible settings are resolved, search for Configuration Profile Reference and Mobile Device Management Protocol Reference on the Apple Developer web site.
segment.target: For information about how incompatible settings are resolved, search for Configuration Profile Reference and Mobile Device Management Protocol Reference on the Apple Developer web site.

segment.source: Configuration profile details
segment.target: Configuration profile details

segment.source: Displays the xml code for the configuration profile that you imported.
segment.target: Displays the xml code for the configuration profile that you imported.

segment.source: When you are finished, click Save Policy.
segment.target: When you are finished, click Save Policy.

segment.source: The new policy displays in the Configuration Policies node of the Policy workspace.
segment.target: The new policy displays in the Configuration Policies node of the Policy workspace.

segment.source: Deploy an iOS custom policy
segment.target: Deploy an iOS custom policy

segment.source: Deploy the iOS custom policy to one or more groups of users or devices in your organization.
segment.target: Deploy the iOS custom policy to one or more groups of users or devices in your organization.

segment.source: For help deploying policies, see Use policies to manage computers and mobile devices with Microsoft Intune.
segment.target: For help deploying policies, see Use policies to manage computers and mobile devices with Microsoft Intune.

segment.source: A status summary and alerts on the Overview page of the Policy workspace identify issues with the policy that require your attention.
segment.target: A status summary and alerts on the Overview page of the Policy workspace identify issues with the policy that require your attention.

segment.source: Additionally, a status summary appears in the Dashboard workspace.
segment.target: Additionally, a status summary appears in the Dashboard workspace.

segment.source: See Also
segment.target: See Also

segment.source: Use policies to manage computers and mobile devices with Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Use policies to manage computers and mobile devices with Microsoft Intune
